suggest.apache-solr-for-typo3/solr: Allows to use Solr Cell - Apache Tika embedded in Apache Solr.
suggest.apache-solr-for-typo3/solrfal: EXT:tika + EXT:solrfal make the files(TYPO3 FAL) indexable and searchable within EXT:solr.

scripts-descriptions.t3:docs:build: Renders the docs. Note: Can not run inside docker container, because uses TYPO3 dockrun_t3rd
scripts-descriptions.t3:docs:build:prod: Same as t3:docs:build, but places the rendered docs in Resources/Public/Documentation and symlinks them to EXT:tika/Documentation.HTML
scripts-descriptions.t3:docs:clean: Deletes all rendered docs created by t3:docs:build or t3:docs:build:prod.
scripts-descriptions.t3:standards:fix: Fixes a possible TYPO3 coding standards errors.
scripts-descriptions.tests:env: Checks the requierements in environment for tests.
scripts-descriptions.tests:lint-xml: Lints the XML/XLF files. Depends on global installed sclable/xml-lint. See tests:setup:global-require
scripts-descriptions.tests:restore-git: [Internal script], which is used after tests:setup to restore the composer.json.
scripts-descriptions.tests:setup: Installs composer dependencies, requiered for tests.
scripts-descriptions.tests:setup:global-require: Installs global composer dependencies. Those are moved to global, to avoid collisions and downgrades on libs.
scripts-descriptions.tika:download: Download Tika binaries/".jar" files. App and Server files.
scripts-descriptions.tika:download:app: Download Tika app binariy/".jar" file only.
scripts-descriptions.tika:download:server: Download Tika server binariy/".jar" file only.

scripts.tests:restore-git: echo "Retore composer.json to initial state:" && git checkout composer.json
tests:env: if [ -z ${TYPO3_VERSION+x} ]; then >&2 echo "Can not proceed, because env var TYPO3_VERSION is not set"; exit 1; else echo "Setup test environment for TYPO3 ${TYPO3_VERSION}"; fi
if [ -z ${TIKA_PATH+x} ]; then echo "Can not proceed, because env var TIKA_PATH is not set"; exit 1; fi
if echo $TYPO3_VERSION | grep -q "dev"; then $COMPOSER_BINARY config minimum-stability dev; fi
tests:setup: # @todo: Abort if composer.json has not staged/commited changes on composer.json, to avoid losing necessery changes.
tests:phpstan: COMPOSER_VENDOR_DIR=$($COMPOSER_BINARY config vendor-dir) phpstan analyze -c Build/Test/phpstan.neon
tests:lint-xml: if ! $($COMPOSER_BINARY config home)/vendor/bin/xmllint Resources/Private/Language/ --pattern='*.xlf' --exclude=.Build/*; then echo "Some XML files are not valid" && echo "Please fix the files listed above" && export EXIT_CODE=4; else echo "No syntax errors! Great job!"; fi
